abstract: The node that this body is connected to.
overview:
## Discussion

You associate the body with a node by assigning it to the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/physicsBody] property of the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode] object. If the body is not associated with a node, the value is `nil`.

# node

**Instance Property**

The node that this body is connected to.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var node: SKNode? { get }
```

## Discussion

You associate the body with a node by assigning it to the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/physicsBody] property of the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode] object. If the body is not associated with a node, the value is `nil`.
title: node
